__e: And so, after leaving that delightful old man, who is convinced that his famous son is still alive, I began to wonder "Is it possible?"
This here old man just... lived a life and just died out of it.
Look, I hate to break it to you, But the president is just an old man who stares out the window.
There's nobody here but an old man and a kid!
I haven't offended that old guy but he turned me into an enemy of the village
I'm old compared to you and I don't understand either.
